1284.name: Guts
1284.Applications:
Guts is suitable for all materials that has conductivity, it is used on aluminium, cast iron, steel, copper, nickel etc…. Guts can be a solution in cases where a cutting flame will produce too much 
heat or at hardly reachable places. Also it can be very useful on materials that cannot be flame cut such as stainless steel.
1284.Suitable_For: Gouging, drilling holes, remove old weld metal, chamfering, cutting, weld preparations etc.
